name: Draw Line - Connect the Dot
description:
Draw Line - Connect the Dot is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Draw Line - Connect the Dot. But pipes will break if they cross or overlap!
Draw Line - Connect Dots gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Draw Line - Connect the Dot a try, and experience "Relaxing Lines"!

Draw Line features:

- free puzzles levels and Relaxing Lines
- Fun sound effects
- Clean, colorful graphics
